description: This file defines an interface for managing applications within the WPEFramework. It includes a nested notification interface for app lifecycle events and provides methods for app operations such as launch, load, close, terminate, and property management. It also contains configuration setters/getters for resource limits related to apps.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for application management, including methods for app lifecycle control and event notifications.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about application events such as installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register an application management notification listener.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregister a previously registered notification listener.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieve a list of launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieve a list of currently loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launch a specified application with given intent and arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Load a specified application with given intent and arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepare an application for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Send a message to a specific application.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Close a running application.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminate a running application.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clear data of a specific application.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Set focus to a specific application.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieve metadata for a specific application.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Get a property value of an application.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Set a property value for an application.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Set the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Get the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Set the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Get the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Set the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Get the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Set the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Get the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
